result_list.explanation: Avec résolution. This stage direction describes the manner in which something is said, indicating a delivery category.
Air : De la baronne. This stage direction indicates a tune name, which falls under the music category.
Il ajuste son col. This stage direction describes interaction with an object (adjusting a collar), which is the object category.
AIR. Allons gai, toujours gai. This stage direction indicates a tune name, which falls under the music category.
Air : Comment faire. This stage direction indicates a tune name, which falls under the music category.
À Phlipotte. This stage direction indicates the addressee of a speech, which is the toward category.
Au laquais. This stage direction indicates the addressee of a speech, which is the toward category.
En montrant ses jambes. This stage direction describes a non-verbal interaction (showing legs), which is the interaction category.
AIR : le joli jeu d'amour. This stage direction indicates a tune name, which falls under the music category.
Il reste en contemplation. This stage direction describes a general character action (remaining in contemplation), which is the action category.
